frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopup.original: Hide donation buttons in the popup

frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopupDescrip.message: Det √§r inte som jag inte vill att du ska f√• Talkie üåü Premium eller donera f√∂r att st√∂dja Talkie och √∂ppen k√§llkod i allm√§nhet - jag bara inte vill att du ska vara irriterad n√§r du anv√§nder Talkie i f√∂rsta hand. frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopupDescrip.original: It's not like I don't want you to get Talkie üåü Premium or donate to support Talkie and open source development in general - I just don't want you to be annoyed when using Talkie in the first place. If you disable the donation buttons in the popup, I hope that you will also support Talkie in some way! The buttons will always be available here among the options, just in case.

frontend_storyDescription.message: Talkie utvecklades ett par dagar f√∂re ny√•r 2016/2017, p√• en utmaning fr√•n en v√§n. Utmaningen b√∂rjade med fr√•gan: under resan till jobbet, √§r det m√∂jligt att lyssna p√• en artikel ist√§llet f√∂r att l√§sa det? Enkelt, sa jag, och best√§mde sig f√∂r att bevisa det - eller √•tminstone att g√∂ra min webbl√§sare tala ut text med en dum datorr√∂st. Basversionen utan anv√§ndargr√§nssnitt, visade sig vara trivialt att skapa. L√§gga ett anv√§ndargr√§nssnitt, tog lite l√§ngre tid. L√§gga korrekt spr√•kidentifiering ett g√§ng mer kod. Att √∂vervinna buggar i webbl√§saren √§nnu mer arbete. Listan √∂ver f√∂rb√§ttringar och funktioner g√•r p√• - och n√•gra tusen rader kod senare, du tittar p√• slutresultatet.
frontend_storyDescription.original: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it - or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic version, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on - and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.

frontend_storyThankYou.message: Tack f√∂r att du anv√§nder Talkie - om du gillar det, ber√§tta f√∂r dina v√§nner!
frontend_storyThankYou.original: Thank you for using Talkie - if you like it, tell your friends!
